00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031   createinfo(argc, argv);
00032 
00033   // enough arguments ?
00034 
00035   if (argc < 2) {
00036     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] mcstate"
00037             "\n     -j jini:jfin    2j of initial and final state"
00038             "\n     -p +1|-1        parity of initial state"
00039             "\n     -l MULTIPOLE    multipole density"
00040             "\n     -a INDEX        index of initial state"
00041             "\n     -b INDEX        index of final state"
00042             "\n     -q QMAX         calculate to max momentum"
00043             "\n     -n NPOINTS      number of points"
00044             "\n     -P NALPHA-NBETA number of angles"
00045             "\n     -r              with recoil\n",
00046             argv[0]);
00047     exit(-1);
00048   }
00049 
00050   int hermit = 0;
00051 
00052   // formfactor parameters
00053 
00054   int npoints = 51;
00055   double qmax = 5.0;
00056   int nalpha = 5; 
00057   int ncosb = 4;
00058   int recoil = 0;
00059   int l=0;
00060 
00061   // grid in coordinate space
00062 
00063   double rmax = 15.0;
00064   double deltar = 0.05;
00065   int npointsr = (int) (rmax/deltar) + 1;
00066 
00067   // project to this state
00068   int jfin=-1, jini=-1, pfin=-1, pini=-1, alpha=0, beta=0;
00069 
00070   /* manage command-line options */
00071 
00072   char c; char* jparas; char* projparas;
00073   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "j:p:a:b:l:rq:n:P:")) != -1)
00074     switch (c) {
00075     case 'j':
00076       jparas = optarg;
00077       char* j = strtok(jparas, ":");
00078       jini = atoi(j);
00079       j = strtok(NULL, ":");
00080       jfin = atoi(j);
00081       break;
00082     case 'p':
00083       pini = atoi(optarg) == -1 ? 1 : 0;
00084       break;
00085     case 'a':
00086       alpha = atoi(optarg);
00087       break;
00088     case 'b':
00089       beta = atoi(optarg);
00090       break;
00091     case 'l':
00092       l = atoi(optarg);
00093       break;
00094     case 'r':
00095       recoil = 1;
00096       break;
00097     case 'q':
00098       qmax = atof(optarg);
00099       break;
00100     case 'n':
00101       npoints = atoi(optarg);
00102       break;
00103     case 'P':
00104       projparas = optarg;
00105       char* ang = strtok(projparas, "-");
00106       nalpha = atoi(ang);
00107       ang = strtok(NULL, "-");
00108       ncosb = atoi(ang);
00109       break;
00110     }
00111 
00112   char* mcstatefile = argv[optind];
00113   char** mbfile;
00114 
00115   // open multiconfigfile
00116   Projection P;
00117   SlaterDet* Q;
00118   Symmetry* S;
00119   Eigenstates E;

00121 
00122   if (readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefile, &mbfile, &P, &Q, &S, &E, &n)) {
00123     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", mcstatefile);
00124     exit(-1);
00125   }
00126 
00127   FormfactorPara FfP = {
00128     qmax : qmax,
00129     npoints : npoints,
00130     nalpha : nalpha,
00131     ncosb : ncosb,
00132     recoil : recoil
00133   };
00134 
00135   int i;
00136   int a,b;
00137 
00138   // Pi unset
00139   if (pini == -1) pini = (Q[0].A % 2 ? 1 : 0); 
00140   pfin = (pini+l)%2;
00141 
00142   fprintf(stderr, "Jini: %d%c1, Jfin: %d%c1, alpha: %d, beta: %d\n", 
00143           jini, pini ? '-' : '+', jfin, pfin ? '-' : '+', alpha, beta);
00144 
00145   // calculate certain multipoles
00146 
00147   int nmulti = 1;
00148   int multi[NMULTIPOLES] = {0, 0, 0, 0};
00149   multi[l] = 1;
00150 
00151   // Project formfactor on angular momentum
00152 
00153   initOpFormfactors(&FfP);
00154 
00155   void* ffactorme[NMULTIPOLES][n*n];
00156 
00157   // read or calculate matrix elements
00158 
00159   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00160     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00161       for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)   
00162         if (multi[i]) {
00163           ffactorme[i][a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i]);
00164 
00165           if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P,
00166                                         &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], S[a], S[b],
00167                                         ffactorme[i][a+b*n])) {
00168             fprintf(stderr, "could not read matrix elements\n");
00169             exit(-1);
00170           }
00171         }
00172     }
00173 
00174   if (hermit) {
00175     for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)
00176       if (multi[i])
00177         hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], ffactorme[i], n);
00178   }
00179 
00180   fprintf(stderr, "calculate transition values\n");
00181 
00182   // calculate static formfactors
00183   void* ffactortrans[NMULTIPOLES];
00184 
00185   for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)   
00186     if (multi[i]) {
00187       ffactortrans[i] = initprojectedtransitionVectornull(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], n, n);
00188       calctransitionprojectedMBMEipj(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], ffactorme[i], 
00189                                      S, S, &E, &E, 
00190                                      jfin, pfin, beta, jini, pini, alpha, 
00191                                      ffactortrans[i]);
00192     }
00193 
00194   // output
00195 
00196   char outfile[255];
00197 
00198   snprintf(outfile, 255, "%s-%s.%d-%s.%d.transpointdensred", 
00199            stripstr(mcstatefile, ".states"), 
00200            AngmomtoStr(jini, pini), alpha,
00201            AngmomtoStr(jfin, pfin), beta);
00202 
00203   // write densities to data files
00204 
00205   char datafile[255];
00206   FILE *datafp;
00207 
00208   snprintf(datafile, 255, "%s-%d--%05.2f-%d-%d-%d%s.data", 
00209            outfile, l,
00210            qmax, npoints, nalpha, ncosb, recoil ? "-recoil" : "");
00211 
00212   if (!(datafp = fopen(datafile, "w"))) {
00213     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", datafile);
00214     exit(-1);
00215   }
00216 
00217   for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)
00218     if (multi[i]) {
00219       writeTransitionPointDensities(datafp, &P, &FfP,
00220                                     rmax, npointsr,
00221                                     Q[0].A, i,
00222                                     jfin, pfin, beta, jini, pini, alpha, 
00223                                     ffactortrans[l], &E);
00224     }
00225 
00226   fclose(datafp);
00227 
00228   return 0;
